1.  Validating  the  Paradise  Hadron  and  Paradise  Energy  
Paradise  Hadron  Properties :  
●  Mass :  ~7.2  GeV/c².  ●  Decay  Products :  Two  muons  and  a  charged  pion.  ●  Role :  Stabilizer  of  heavy-quark  dynamics  in  exotic  matter.
